de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.game
Class Game

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.app.Application
      com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication
          de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme3.system.SystemListener
public class Game
extends com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication

Visual-Computing Praktikum - Aufgabe 2

Actual implementation of the SimpleApplication class provided by the jMonkeyEngine

This class contains all the game logic

Author:
Bernd Spaeth, Wladimir Spindler and Saman Sedighi Rad

lastPlayer

private Player lastPlayer

getPlayerPosition

private int getPlayerPosition(java.lang.String playerName)
                       throws java.lang.Exception

Returns the current position of the given player in the global player list from the server.

This must be different from the local hash map positions in players, because each client add himself first to the list.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

                  Inventory give,
                  Inventory get)
           throws java.io.IOException,

Triggers the trade action along the network.

Parameters:
from - The unit who wants to trade.
to - The unit with which shall be traded.
give - Inventory object of the goods which the from player wants to give away.
get - Inventory object of the goods that the player wants to have.

fixUnitMap

public void fixUnitMap()

This is an ugly fix for the units, which are reset on their actual position.

The are some situations we need to call this method, unfortunately.

The usage of this method could be redundant in the future.

updateExplosions

public void updateExplosions(float tpf)
Calls each explosion update callback. Was originally a list of Explosion objects, but had an issue with thread concurrency, so we have now only one.

Parameters:
tpf - Timer per frame of the original game.
